ygData.subject: Re: Welcome All
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello to everyone also! I agree, its nice to have a place where clerics can discuss things :) I personally have started to wonder if my role is going to be the
ygData.messageBody:
Hello to everyone also! I agree, its nice to have a place where clerics can discuss things :)

I personally have started to wonder if my role is going to be the same from now on, i.e. staring at the pages of my spell books
for what seems to be ages, then getting up for a short burst of casting, then BAM back to the book again. I recently have been
hunting in Unrest, where clerics SHOULD rule, and yet I was told by a shaman that HIS poison spell was more effective then my
Dismiss undead, and I am a few levels higher then this shaman. It didn't make me mad so much as disappointed, I truely want to be
GREAT at some part in the game, and I thought it was with undead <G> Anyway, this isn't meant to be a rant in as much as a
question; do any of you all feel this way at times?

Back the those pages!

Jazebo D'Elysian 28 Cleric Veeshan

> From: eqdungin@...
>
> Hello , just wanted to say hello to everyone, and hope the list grows! it's nice to have a place just for clerics to discuss.
>
> Dungin
> Level 18 Cleric Rathe
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
